<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Créer un nouvel exercice"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/exercises"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permet à un utilisateur authentifié de créer un exercice personnalisé

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"Titre de l'exercice","example":"Pompes modifiées"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description détaillée de l'exercice","example":"Pompes adaptées pour les débutants, genoux au sol"},"imageUrl":{"type":"string","description":"URL de l'image de démonstration","example":"https://example.com/images/pompes-modifiees.jpg"},"durationMinutes":{"type":"number","description":"Durée de l'exercice en minutes","example":15},"intensity":{"type":"string","description":"Niveau d'intensité de l'exercice","enum":["VERY_LOW","LOW","MODERATE","HIGH","VERY_HIGH"],"example":"MODERATE"},"muscleZone":{"type":"string","description":"Zone musculaire ciblée","enum":["UPPER_BODY","LOWER_BODY","CORE","FULL_BODY","CARDIO","FLEXIBILITY","BALANCE"],"example":"UPPER_BODY"}},"required":["title"],"title":"CreateExerciseDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Exercice créé avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"exercise":{"description":"Exercice créé avec succès","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant de l'exercice","example":"exe_123456789"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Nom de l'exercice","example":"Squats au poids du corps"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description détaillée de l'exercice","example":"Exercice de renforcement pour les jambes et les fessiers"},"imageUrl":{"type":"string","description":"URL de l'image de l'exercice","example":"https://fitme-app.com/images/exercises/squats.jpg"},"durationMinutes":{"type":"number","description":"Durée recommandée en minutes","example":15},"formattedDuration":{"type":"string","description":"Durée formatée","example":"15min"},"intensity":{"type":"string","enum":["VERY_LOW","LOW","MODERATE","HIGH","VERY_HIGH"],"description":"Niveau d'intensité","example":"MODERATE"},"intensityLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label d'intensité en français","example":"Modérée"},"muscleZone":{"type":"string","enum":["UPPER_BODY","LOWER_BODY","CORE","FULL_BODY","CARDIO","FLEXIBILITY","BALANCE"],"description":"Zone musculaire travaillée","example":"LOWER_BODY"},"muscleZoneLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label de zone musculaire en français","example":"Bas du corps"},"isFavorite":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indique si l'exercice est dans les favoris","example":true},"averageRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note moyenne de l'exercice","example":4.3},"totalRatings":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total d'évaluations","example":127},"userRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note donnée par l'utilisateur actuel","example":5},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de création","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de dernière modification","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","title","formattedDuration","intensityLabel","muscleZoneLabel","isFavorite","averageRating","totalRatings","createdAt","updatedAt"],"title":"ExerciseDetailsDto"}]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message de confirmation","example":"Exercice créé avec succès"}},"required":["exercise","message"],"title":"CreateExerciseResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides pour la création de l'exercice"},"401":{"description":"Non autorisé - token JWT requis"}}}
 id="exercise-controller-create-exercise-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
